title: Gellert Bleinheim
content:
Gellert Bleinheim, Šémkovi znám jako "drogový lord", (and most likely Roland's brother) appears to head up the fisstech production operation for Salamandra in the stoky. This lab is guarded by two thugs and requires a password (or some other form of persuasion) for entry.

He and his thugs are found at the southernmost accessible part of the sewers (where they tunnels form a "Y"). He also holds the Šifrovací klíč Salamandry, which is necessary to decipher zašifrovaný dokument recovered as part the Diplomacie a lov quest.

Úkoly
Diplomacie a lov
Po nitce až ke klubíčku
Wyzimská spojka
